quizMaxQuestionsLimit: Quiz should not have more than {max_value} questions.
quizMinQuestionsRequired: Quiz must include at least {min_value} question.
questionMaxAnswersLimit: Each question should not have more than {max_value} answers.
questionMinAnswersRequired: Each question must include at least {min_value} answer.
singleCorrectAnswerQuestionRules: Single Correct Answer questions must have {correct_value} correct answer and at least {min_value} answers overall.
multipleCorrectAnswersQuestionRules: Multiple Correct Answers questions must have at least {correct_value} correct answers and at least {min_value} answers overall.
sortingQuestionMinAnswers: Sorting questions must have at least {min_value} answers.
sortingQuestionDistinctOrderNumbers: Sorting questions must have distinct order numbers.
plainTextQuestionRules: Plain Text questions must have exactly {value} answer and it needs to be correct.
